name: alley 404
description:
Mixed with plants, food, uncommon scenes & even suitable for vegetarian players, recommended for users who'd like to know how simple HTML-codes could define a bunch of exciting stuff? View some funny lines while exploring hidden regions, could additionally direct you to innovative paths with alternate ending-sequences.

Controls / Interaction:

clicks, keyboard

Features:

  • translated paragraphs in english and german language
  • tested on "basilisk"-browser which is similar to "firefox", also kind of working on "explorer" too (still color-changes in texts & other interactive parts won't be displayed as originally designed there)
  • coded on a bigger screen, so probably won't be enjoyable on mobile-devices
  • game-file got programmed without any audio to keep it simple and quite minimalistic in size

Possibly planned sequels:

  • additional focus for either buildings / animals / artificial intelligence / etc.
  • different story with game-play that includes fictional moments
  • title could (slightly) vary as nickname or probably being a bit hidden reference to pre-versions
  • coding will stick to easy ways of its design and keep getting a manual translation
  • game being available as html-type, for free and playable on webbrowser
